alert.note: Alert for Arthur; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 8:26PM CDT until June 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Arthur County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/. * At 826 PM CDT/726 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles southeast of Arthur, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bucktail Lake and Diamond Bar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
